title: Shady Or Not: Is It Strange That He Doesn't Have A Social Media Presence?
description:
You connected with someone, and you two started dating. But they’ve done something that makes you question their character. And now you’re not certain if you should continue dating them or not – and that’s where we come in! Tell us your situation, and we’ll tell you if their offense is shady or not.
She tried to research a guy she met at a party but came up empty-handed. He has no social media, and no one from the party knows who he is. Is this sketchy or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
